column2: "You're interested, aren't ya? Yeah, I thought you would be. I oughta know what makes you tick by now."

"'Course, I could beat 'em all with one hand tied behind my back. But then
you'd have nothing to do, huh, killer?"

"I thought I'd let ya take the credit, you know, show off your stuff a bit.
I'll be watchin' on the monitor, same as usual."

"Oh yeah, almost forgot! I'm gonna need ya to take out a lot, like, 60,
so clear your schedule before ya go!"
